data.title: Fabio Motta Pievi
data.meta_description: Mature black-skinned fruit, violet, clove and a whiff of sea breeze aromas take center stage on this polished red. Made with 50% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon and 25% Sangiovese, the linear palate offers dried Morello cherry, red currant and a hint of ground pepper set against taut fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2021.
data.text:
Mature black-skinned fruit, violet, clove and a whiff of sea breeze aromas take center stage on this polished red. Made with 50% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon and 25% Sangiovese, the linear palate offers dried Morello cherry, red currant and a hint of ground pepper set against taut fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2021.

Description

Mature black-skinned fruit, violet, clove and a whiff of sea breeze aromas take center stage on this polished red. Made with 50% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon and 25% Sangiovese, the linear palate offers dried Morello cherry, red currant and a hint of ground pepper set against taut fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2021.

Additional information

Size

750ml

Vintage

Country

Region
